properties.areaDesc: Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 9 at 3:06PM CST until January 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT...

* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 15 to 25 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 7 to 10 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, southeast winds 15 to 20 kt with gusts
up to 30 kt and seas 6 to 8 feet.

* WHERE...Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from
20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20
to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 AM Friday to midnight CST
Friday night. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 9 AM CST
Friday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST FRIDAY
